title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles
description: Darkness has settled over New York City as Shredder and his evil Foot Clan have an iron grip on everything from the police to the politicians. The future is grim until four unlikely outcast brothers rise from the sewers and discover their destiny as Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles. The Turtles must work with fearless reporter April O'Neil and her cameraman Vern Fenwick to save the city and unravel Shredder's diabolical plan. Written by Paramount Pictures
castList: [Megan Fox, Will Arnett, William Fichtner, Alan Ritchson, Noel Fisher, Pete Ploszek, Johnny Knoxville, Jeremy Howard, Danny Woodburn, Tony Shalhoub, Tohoru Masamune, Whoopi Goldberg, Minae Noji, Abby Elliott, Madison Mason]
characterList: [April O'Neil, Vernon Fenwick, Eric Sacks, Raphael, Michelangelo, Leonardo, Leonardo (voice), Donatello, Splinter, Splinter (voice), Shredder, Bernadette Thompson, Karai, Taylor, Councilman]
